text: Dean Slaugh (March 29, 1929 â€” April 13, 2009) was an American Paralympic archer. He won four gold medals at the 1964 Summer Paralympics. == Biography == He served in the Korean War where he became injured on 1 September 1950 in Busan. He started with archery in 1962. == References == == Other websites == * Dean Slaugh (1929-2009) - Find a Grave Memorial Category:1929 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the United States Category:American archers
title: Dean Slaugh
